title: A cradle-to-gate life cycle assessment of green methanol production using direct air capture
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00316K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nicholas Badger, Rahim Boylu, Valentine Ilojianya, Mustafa Erguvan, Shahriar Amini
Synthetic methanol can be produced from carbon dioxide captured from ambient air with great improvements in many environmental impact categories compared to traditional production methods.
